titles.title: Recognizing and congratulating Apolo Anton Ohno for his historic performances in short track speedskating at the 2006 and 2002 Olympic Winter Games.
Recognizing and congratulating Apolo Anton Ohno for his historic performances in short track speedskating at the 2006 and 2002 Olympic Winter Games.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: Congratulates Apolo Anton Ohno for his historic performance in short track speedskating at the 2006 and 2002 Olympic Winter Games.
